name: Software Development Company Acceptic
tag_list: custom-web-development, facebook-apps, facebook-applications, facebook-connect, web-application-development, php-ajax, mobile-software-development, php-web-design, blackberry-application-development, mobile-programming, dedicated-teams, dedicated-develope
overview:
Software outsourcing company Acceptic offers custom Web, Facebook, and mobile application development. Transparent result- and client-oriented cooperation model allows achieving best-of-breed results on specifications, on time, and under budget.

** Main Services

* Cross-platform distributed software
* Custom Web application development
* Facebook applications
* Facebook Connect, Twitter, Flickr, mobile integration
* Mobile application development (iPhone, Blackberry)
* Firmware development
* Dedicated developer/team service
  • Software and firmware development

Cross-platform C++ development is among our core expertises. Both stand-alone and web-based client-server applications for data recovering and transferring, firmware, drivers, and many others domains are present in our portfolio.

  • Custom Web application development

Day-to-day business routine can be automated by utilizing web-based applications. High-load e-commerce solutions, e-catalogs, business management, social networking websites - all this can be programmed and deployed by the Acceptic team. PHP, mySQL, AJAX, xHTML/CSS, as well as Ruby-on-Rails, Python/Django, Google Maps, Facebook Connect, and other up-to-date technologies are used in our projects.

  • Facebook applications. Facebook, Twitter, Flickr integration

Facebook applications are all the rage now. You can order your own Facebook application and promote your business and yourself with its help.

Facebook Connect allows you to stay synchronized with your friends and your networks in Facebook, Twitter, MySpace, Flickr, etc. wherever you are. The whole scope of unlimited possibilities is real here.

  • Mobile application development

Mobile applications set the pace to our everyday life which makes them of higher priority. The Acceptic team develops stylish applications and games for iPhone, Blackberry, Android-based mobile devices, as well as provides connection and integration with Facebook and Twitter accounts which will keep you updated and wide awake.

  • Dedicated team service

Whether you have a promising business idea which needs to be realized by means of cutting-edge IT solutions - Acceptic’s dedicated teams of web developers, software programmers and QA engineers will carry out it in the best way.
